title: Bastien Duhalde
text: Bastien Duhalde is a <a href="French%20people">French</a> professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He plays at <a href="scrum-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">scrum-half</a> for <a href="Aviron%20Bayonnais">Bayonne</a> in the <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>.
